resources.string: Please read and agree to the Terms of Use. If you are seeing this screen again, the terms have likely been updated.
Not sure how to add the QS tile? Tap here.
Follow me on Mastodon for updates about my apps and random development-related nonsense.
Check out my website if you\'re that bored.
Send me an email if you have a question or problem. Please include as much detail as possible. Just telling me \"it doesn\'t work\" just wastes everyone\'s time.
If email isn\'t your thing, you can ask your question in my Telegram server. Please mention which app you\'re using, as this server is for all of the ones I\'ve developed.
Nacho Notch is open source! If you\'re a developer or tinkerer interested in helping to improve the project (or you just want to check out the source), tap here.
Change the size of the bar, add rounded corners, black out the navigation bar, and more.
How to use Nacho Notch, what to expect from the app, and other things you should probably read over.
Hey! This screen doesn\'t do anything. Nacho Notch is using a QS Tile.\n\nTutorial
Disable this screen and hide the launcher icon
Please allow Nacho Notch to draw over other apps.

Tap the overflow menu to check out the settings! You can choose to black out the navigation bar along with the status bar, enable rounded corners, and even manually adjust the sizing of the blackouts.
